title: (x) Denderhoutem 18 april - various {gang}
content:
What document do you intend to forge when you aquire the font?   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124644im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
author: typotect

comments.content: Since it's printed by another method (mechanical), as Stephen said, you won't find a font to match it, but FontFont has a number of simulations of other printing methods such as FF Call, FF Gateway, FF Eboy and FF Luggagetag -- none are very close to your samples but might be starting points.
